modified:
1.   Product Inspiration and Development Process.

In this revised clause, the focus has been shifted from the creation of the product (which implies completion) to the inspiration and development process, suggesting an ongoing or iterative approach to product development. This change in language may reflect a more flexible or agile approach to product development, where the final product may evolve over time based on feedback and testing. Additionally, the term "Product Concept" has been replaced with "Product Inspiration," which is a bit more open-ended and suggests that the idea behind the product can come from various sources, not just the contractor.

ollama_generated:
3. TL's Purchase Obligation - TL shall have the obligation to purchase the Product as outlined in this Agreement, subject to our prior written consent for each sale.

This modification now places the obligation on TL (the client) to make a purchase, but only with the seller's prior written approval for each sale, which strengthens the seller's control over the sales process.

original: c.       TL may purchase from Integrity limited quantities of the Product for its promotional use, at the Manufacturing cost set forth in paragraph 3(a) above, provided the quantity of such purchases does not exceed seven percent (7%) of the total royalty bearing units of such Product title purchased by TL, TL warrants that any units so purchased, whether or not labeled "promotional only" or cut-out, will be given away for purposes of promotion of the Products, and will not be sold.
ollama_generated: d. Integrity grants TL the right to acquire a maximum of seven percent (7%) of the Product for promotional purposes, at the Manufacturing cost specified in paragraph 3(a) above. This privilege is extended only if the purchased units are intended solely for promotional activities and not for commercial resale. TL is responsible for clearly labeling these promotional units as such and ensuring they are distributed exclusively for promoting the Products, not for any form of monetary gain.

original: b.       If, because of an act of God, inevitable accident, fire, lockout, strike or other labor dispute, riot or civil commotion, act of public enemy, enactment, rule, order or act of any government or governmental instrumentality (whether federal, state, local or foreign), failure of technical facilities, failure or delay of transportation facilities, illness or incapacity of any performer or producer, or other cause of a similar or different nature not reasonably within either party's control, such party is materially hampered in the recording, manufacture, distribution or sale of phonograph records, or its normal business operations become commercially impractical, then without limiting its rights, it will have the option upon notice to suspend the Term of this Agreement for the duration of any such contingency. In the event of a suspension owing to a "force majeure," which suspension exceeds six (6) consecutive months, the non-suspending party may terminate this Agreement upon ten (10) days written notice to other, but only if such "force majeure" does not affect a substantial portion of the United States recording industry or the suspension is not lifted by the suspending party within ten (10) days of the receipt of the written notice from the other party.
ollama_generated: c. In circumstances where unforeseeable events, such as an act of God, inevitable accident, fire, labor disruption, civil unrest, acts of war, legislative actions, regulatory decisions, technical or transportation failures, illness or incapacity of essential personnel, or other uncontrollable factors arise, either party shall have the right to temporarily halt the Term of this Agreement for the duration of such event. Should a "force majeure" event persist for over six (6) months consecutively, the non-affected party retains the prerogative to terminate this Agreement by providing ten (10) days' written notice. However, this termination right shall only be exercised if the said force majeure does not significantly impact a substantial portion of the U.S. recording industry or if the suspension is not lifted by the suspending party within ten (10) days of receiving the written notice from the other party.

original: 12.      Assignment. Either party may, at its election, assign this Agreement or any of its rights or delegate any of its obligations hereunder, in whole or in part, to any person, firm or corporation owning or acquiring all or a substantial portion of its assets, to any person, firm or corporation that is related to it as an affiliate, subsidiary or otherwise, or to any person, firm or corporation into which or with it might merge or consolidate. In the event of such an Source: INTEGRITY MEDIA INC, 10-K405, 3/29/2001 assignment by either party of its rights to an unrelated third party, the other party shall be given written notice, then in such event the other party may upon six-months (6-months) written notice terminate this Agreement.
ollama_generated: 12. Assignment: Either Party retains the right, at its discretion, to transfer or delegate any of its rights or obligations under this Agreement, wholly or partially, to a successor entity that results from a sale, acquisition, merger, consolidation, or any other reorganization involving it. Such transferee shall be bound by the terms and conditions of this Agreement. In the event either party assigns its rights to a third party that is not affiliated with it, the assignee shall immediately notify the other Party in writing. Upon receipt of such notice, the other Party reserves the right, within three months (3-months) following notification, to terminate this Agreement at its sole discretion.

original: 13.      Miscellaneous a.       This Agreement contains the entire understanding of the parties hereto relating to the subject matter hereof and cannot be changed or terminated except by an instrument signed by the party to be bound. A waiver by either party of any term or condition of this Agreement in any instance will not be deemed or construed as a waiver of such term or condition for the future, or of any subsequent breach thereof. All remedies, rights, undertakings, obligations, and agreements contained in this Agreement will be cumulative and none of them will be in limitation of any other remedy, right, undertaking, obligation or agreement of either party. The headings of the paragraphs hereof are for convenience only and will not be deemed to limit or in any way affect the scope, meaning or intent of this Agreement or any portion thereof.
ollama_generated: 13. Miscellaneous a. This Agreement represents the complete understanding between the parties concerning the stated matter, and no alterations or terminations are permissible without a written consent signed by both parties. Any forbearance by either party in disregard of any provision of this Agreement shall not be interpreted as a concession for future breaches of the same nature. All provisions, commitments, responsibilities, and undertakings included within this Agreement are additive rather than restrictive; the presence of one does not diminish the validity or enforceability of another. The titles assigned to each section serve only to facilitate navigation and should not be construed as limiting the scope, interpretation, or intention of this Agreement or any of its parts.
